abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Public Sector
            Reform Project for Tajikistan is to establish legal and
            organizational prerequisites for improved public sector
            management, improve public access to legislation, and
            strengthen regulatory framework in selected areas. The
            changes will amend the Project Development Objective (PDO)
            and modify the main indicators to realistically reflect: (i)
            expected project outcomes, (ii) revised project
            implementation arrangements, and (iii) revised disbursement
            schedule. These changes are based on the evaluation of
            progress during the project mid-term review (May 27, 2009)
            and prevailing project implementation environment.
